title: Authenticating forever?
body:
Hey guys! Aelthya here! 

Just tried to log in and received an error. Okay, no problem. So, I went to log in again, and now I'm stuck on the authentication part of log in. I've been sitting here for about five minutes and was wondering if I should simply try again or if there was an issue that wasn't updated on the server status? Is anyone else running into this problem? If so, and you were able to get on, how do I fix it? 

Any and all help is appreciated and I'd like to thank you in advance for reading through and/or assisting me! 
<3 Aelthya

replies.body: Yes! Thank you so much for hopping on it so swiftly Porocles! I wasn't able to comment or reply earlier due to the bug I was having where I could not authenticate my account on the boards! But yes, thank you so much for all your hard work!
Hey there, there was a big server issue earlier today and we put up a post on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page as soon as we could.  Is everything okay now for you?
